title: /Gymnasium / Fitness Centre, Skill Development Centre, Women Entrepreneurship Centre, Yuva Kendra / Library, Society Office, Balwadi,shall be as per sub-regulation 8 of regulation 33(10) to these transit camps
clause_text: /Gymnasium / Fitness Centre, Skill Development Centre, Women Entrepreneurship Centre, Yuva Kendra / Library, Society Office, Balwadi,shall be as per sub-regulation 8 of regulation 33(10) to these transit camps.25% of Zonal(basic) FSI shall be exclusively used for the purpose of shops along layout road for use of residential occupants of layout.
